modules.description: Converts integer literals ending in 'i' to Optint.t and those ending in 'I' to Optint.Int63.t. Processes numeric values during parsing to enable precise integer handling. Supports direct use in code for large or exact integer representations.

Constructs and manipulates OCaml AST expressions for integer literals and identifiers, using longident and expression lists to generate optimized code representations. Operates on Parsetree.expression and Longident.t to embed custom integer handling in parsed code. Used to transform literal integers into specialized forms during ppx rewrites, such as converting "123" into an optimized 63-bit integer expression.
